attributes.action: shut this farce of a petition site down, as it is clearly a farce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should have known better, than to expect the government to take any notice of the people. 

It only makes 25% of the law now anyway, so has to defend the other 75% made by the EU, without being able to change any of it.

Just look as some of the utterly feeble responses to all the major issues. You may has well send a picture of Gordon, with his fingers in his ears saying "La la la, I'm not listening".

End this pathetic farce now, or face ever further contempt in response to your own.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
